Name: Grum'shar
Traits: Relentless Endurance. When reduced to 0 hit points, Grum'shar drops to 1 hit point instead. He can only do this once per long rest. Spellcasting. Grum'shar is a 1st-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield
Actions: Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
